Example of SequenceOf usage 

>>> from pysnmp.asn1 import univ
>>> class MySequenceOf(univ.SequenceOf):
...     protoComponent = univ.OctetString
...
>>> s = MySequenceOf([univ.OctetString('foo')])
>>> s
MySequenceOf(OctetString('foo'))
>>> s.append(univ.OctetString('bar'))
>>> s
MySequenceOf(OctetString('foo'), OctetString('bar'))
>>> len(s)
2
>>> 'foo' in s
1
>>> s.index('bar')
1
>>> del s[-1]
>>> s
MySequenceOf(OctetString('foo'))
>>> s[0] = univ.Integer()
Traceback (innermost last):
...
pysnmp.asn1.error.BadArgumentError: Unexpected component type Integer at Sequence
>>>

ilya@glas.net
